Subject: Approaching Steadily

(This is an authorized ship.  Just to ease any concerns, it will NOT do 
battle, of course it can defend itself if necessary, though someone would 
have to be very, very dumb to do that.  It cannot be taken over.  It can not 
be mobile, other than to come to the planet and then leave.)



A craft a little more than three times the size of the Iron Fist soared 
through the void of space at a rather rapid speed for such a large ship.  The 
back part of the craft was made of two domes, and the front half was a 
somewhat rectangular shape.  Numerous symbols covered multiple parts of the 
red and black painted hull of the craft.

Inside the bridge of the ship, Suka, stood up from his chair as a readings 
from long range scanners was displayed on the main viewscreen.

"Hmmm...quite good," he said, observing the readout on all power signatures 
on the third planet from the sun in the Sol System.  "Several major bases.  
Hundreds of warriors.  The IGL will work perfectly here." He looked at 
another part of the highly advanced technology.  It read "31.2 lightyears".

"A couple days until we reach Earth.  Then," he paused to examine a close up 
view of Earth's terrain, "the Otyebis will land here."
